SELECT T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.workState, T001Employee.employeeFristName, T001Employee.employeeLastName, T002EmployeeDetail.employeeStatus, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionEndDate, T006EmployeeSiteInfo.unitPrice, T007CustomerInfo.customerName, T007CustomerInfo.customerAbbreviation, T011BpInfoSupplement.bpBelongCustomerCode, T011BpInfoSupplement.bpUnitPrice, T010SalesSituation.salesStaff FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo LEFT JOIN T002EmployeeDetail ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo=T002EmployeeDetail.employeeNo LEFT JOIN T001Employee ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo=T001Employee.employeeNo LEFT JOIN T007CustomerInfo ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.customerNo=T007CustomerInfo.customerNo INNER JOIN
(SELECT T010.* FROM T010SalesSituation as T010 inner join ( SELECT employeeNo,salesYearAndMonth,salesStaff FROM T010SalesSituation where salesStaff = #{eigyou}) as temp on T010.employeeNo = temp.employeeNo and T010.salesYearAndMonth = temp.salesYearAndMonth and T010.salesStaff = temp.salesStaff) as T010SalesSituation
T010SalesSituation
ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo=T010SalesSituation.employeeNo and ( (T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth = left(T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate,6) and T010SalesSituation.confirmCustomer = T006EmployeeSiteInfo.customerNo ) OR (T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth - 1 = left(T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate,6)) and T010SalesSituation.confirmCustomer = T006EmployeeSiteInfo.customerNo ) LEFT JOIN (SELECT T011.*,temp.admissionStartDate FROM T011BpInfoSupplement as T011 inner join (select bpEmployeeNo,max(unitPriceStartMonth) as unitPriceStartMonth,admissionStartDate from T011BpInfoSupplement as T011 left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo as T006 on T011.bpEmployeeNo = T006.employeeNo and T011.unitPriceStartMonth <= left(T006.admissionStartDate,6) where admissionStartDate is not null group by bpEmployeeNo,admissionStartDate) as temp on T011.bpEmployeeNo = temp.bpEmployeeNo and T011.unitPriceStartMonth = temp.unitPriceStartMonth) AS T011BpInfoSupplement ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo=T011BpInfoSupplement.bpEmployeeNo and T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate=T011BpInfoSupplement.admissionStartDate where T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate > #{startDate} AND (T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate < #{endDate} OR (T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate < #{endDate} and T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionEndDate is null) ) and employeeStatus = ifnull(#{intoCompanyCode},employeeStatus) ORDER BY T006EmployeeSiteInfo.admissionStartDate

SELECT T010SalesSituation.employeeNo,M021SalesProgress.salesProgressName,T010SalesSituation.salesProgressCode,T010SalesSituation.customerContractStatus,T002EmployeeDetail.employeeStatus,T011BpInfoSupplement.bpBelongCustomerCode,T001Employee.employeeFristName,T001Employee.employeeLastName,T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth yearAndMonth,T007CustomerInfo.customerName,T002EmployeeDetail.intoCompanyCode,M004IntoCompany.intoCompanyName,T010SalesSituation.salesStaff FROM T010SalesSituation
INNER JOIN ( SELECT employeeNo,salesYearAndMonth,salesStaff FROM T010SalesSituation where salesStaff = #{eigyou}) as temp on T010SalesSituation.employeeNo = temp.employeeNo and T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth = temp.salesYearAndMonth and T010SalesSituation.salesStaff = temp.salesStaff
LEFT JOIN T002EmployeeDetail ON T010SalesSituation.employeeNo=T002EmployeeDetail.employeeNo LEFT JOIN M021SalesProgress ON T010SalesSituation.salesProgressCode=M021SalesProgress.salesProgressCode LEFT JOIN M004IntoCompany ON T002EmployeeDetail.intoCompanyCode=M004IntoCompany.intoCompanyCode LEFT JOIN T011BpInfoSupplement ON T010SalesSituation.employeeNo=T011BpInfoSupplement.bpEmployeeNo LEFT JOIN T007CustomerInfo ON T010SalesSituation.interviewCustomer1=T007CustomerInfo.customerNo LEFT JOIN T001Employee ON T010SalesSituation.employeeNo = T001Employee.employeeNo Where T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth between ifnull(#{startDate},T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth) and ifnull(#{endDate},T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth) order by T010SalesSituation.salesYearAndMonth,T010SalesSituation.employeeNo
SELECT employeeNo,reflectYearAndMonth,salary FROM T005WagesInfo order by employeeNo,reflectYearAndMonth;

SELECT T006EmployeeSiteInfo.employeeNo,substring(admissionStartDate,1,6) as startTime,substring(admissionEndDate,1,6) as endTime,T006EmployeeSiteInfo.customerNo,T007CustomerInfo.customerName,T007CustomerInfo.levelCode FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo LEFT JOIN T007CustomerInfo ON T006EmployeeSiteInfo.customerNo=T007CustomerInfo.customerNo;
